original_title: FUTA reaches decision to resume lectures in universities from the 17th of April.
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The Federation of University Teachers' Associations has reached a decision to resume lectures in universities from the 17th of April.
This was during a discussion held between the members of the Federation that was held until early this morning.
The official announcement in this regard is scheduled to be issued in the morning.
However, no agreement was reached with regard to participating in the evaluation of the GCE AL 2022 answer scripts.
The university teachers began their strike on the 9th of March against several issues including the unjust tax policy of the government.
